tasks.title: Add CHANGELOG task requirement to design phase
tasks.description: In design.core.md: (1) Add 'CHANGELOG.md update (required — add entries under [Unreleased])' to the Quality (Level 5) bullet list in the Phase Structure template, (2) Add 'Task graph includes a CHANGELOG.md update task in the final quality level' to the Completion Criteria section.

tasks.title: Add CHANGELOG validation to ship action
tasks.description: In git.details.md: Insert a CHANGELOG validation step in the ship action pipeline between step 1 (Commit) and step 2 (Push). The step checks 'git diff {base}...HEAD -- CHANGELOG.md' for changes. If no changes found, use AskUserQuestion to warn the user with options: 'Add CHANGELOG entry now (Recommended)' or 'Continue without CHANGELOG'. Update the pipeline steps list to include step 1.5.

verification.command: grep -q 'CHANGELOG' mahabharatha/data/commands/git.details.md && grep -q 'AskUserQuestion' mahabharatha/data/commands/git.details.md && echo PASS

conflict_matrix.description: No conflicts — tasks modify different files
